metadata.description: Developer workflow skills for git, issue management, and platform-specific tooling

plugins.name: git-workflows
plugins.description: Automate Git workflows: generate commit messages from diffs, create PR descriptions from branch history, and determine semantic versions for releases

plugins.name: issue-management
plugins.description: Turn bugs into actionable tickets and break down features into implementation plans—works with any issue tracker

plugins.name: gitlab-tools
plugins.description: Quick reference for GitLab CLI (glab) commands—issues, merge requests, pipelines, and CI/CD operations

plugins.name: jira-tools
plugins.description: Quick reference for Atlassian CLI (acli) commands—JQL queries, ticket transitions, comments, and workflow operations

plugins.name: scorevision
plugins.description: ScoreVision team conventions for Jira workflows, ticket states, and development processes
